description:
Slip-on or step-in, these ultralight runners are great for sunny days by the sea, the lake, or anywhere you might get wet. Built on On’s distinctive CloudTec sole, the 5 Coasts are incredibly comfy and great for long days of exploring. A lightweight mesh upper promotes airflow and lets water drain with ease, because you never know when you might find the perfect swimming hole.

  • Mesh upper dries quickly, breathes well and packs down small
  • CloudTec® sole uses EVA pods that compress on footstrike, then rebound to provide a little extra energy with every step
  • Collapsible heel lets you wear the shoes like slippers, or flip it up and wear them like normal
  • Antimicrobial footbed helps keep funk to a minimum and makes wearing with no socks more appealing
  • Speedboard® midsole provides responsive flex and rocker that encourages the natural rolling process and promotes explosive take-offs
  • Speed-lace system is easy to adjust, and once you have it dialled, you can just slip the shoes on and go
  • Outsole is super-light Zero-Gravity foam for a responsive, cushioned landing
  • Advanced abrasion pads treads provide great grip
  • If these are your first On Clouds, On recommends sizing a half size up
name: On Cloud 5 Coast Shoes - Men's
